ygData.subject: New ex-rogue druid
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy, I started playing EQ about a month ago and I recently deleted my level 16 Rogue (i wasn t twinked hehe) from Sullon Zek so I could become a Druid. I
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy,<br> I started playing EQ about a month ago
and I recently deleted my level 16 Rogue (i wasn't
twinked hehe) from Sullon Zek so I could become a Druid.
I am now level 5 fighting gnolls in Qeynos Hills
and Blackburrow. Could you please give me some advice
as I am not used to being a caster. <br><br>P.S.
When I finally get my surname what should it be? I am
thinking about Yardstickman. (inside joke hehe)<br><br>"Be
not simply good but good for
something."<br><br>Maniac<br>Level 5 Druid<br>Sullon Zek
